fullText: Menzel's voice, that stratospheric instrument that can make the rafters ring, is in glorious form. But the musical itself, despite some lovely moments, never quite coheres into something transcendent.
dtliExcerpt: Menzel's voice, that stratospheric instrument that can make the rafters ring, is in glorious form. But the musical itself, despite some lovely moments, never quite coheres into something transcendent.
bwwExcerpt: "The new "If/Then" is sleeker, smarter and runs far more efficiently than last year's ungainlier model, the one that had its test-drive in Washington last fall. Its heart is bigger now, too, a design modification that assures a more exhilarating ride....
